author: Kozejin
install_msg:
Thank you for installing MinecraftAPI!
 Type `[p]help MinecraftAPI` to see the commands.
name: MinecraftAPI
short: Look up Minecraft player and server information.
description: Search Minecraft player profiles, skins, capes, and server status using the Mojang API.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store user data.
